newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Energy closes American Enviro purchase.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Energy closes American Enviro purchase.

text.p: U.S. Energy Systems Inc on Tuesday said it completed the acquisition of American Enviro-Services Inc, in a deal valued at $3 million.

American Enviro-Services is involved in the collection and recycling of used motor and industrial oils, provides industrial waste-water treatment and 24-hour emergency response services in the midwestern United States. It also provides environmental consulting services.
U.S. Energy develops, owns and operates cogeneration and independent power projects throughout the United States.
